content:
The hostile rocket strike on Friday night was mainly directed in energy infrastructure in the western regions of Ukraine.

A spokesman for the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Elijah Yevlash told this about itTelelorphoneThe only news.

“A very large number of missiles has not achieved its goals. Mostly aimed at power plants and other objects of critical infrastructure ... For the most part, the blow was aimed at the western regions of Ukraine, ”said Ilya Yevlash.

According to him, mostly rocket launches came from Kursk, Belgorod, Ryazan regions of the Russian Federation and temporarily occupied Crimea.

Elijah Yevlash added that the time of today's attack and in previous days the enemy struck various types of lesions, including new modifications of aviation bombs.

“This is evidenced by a blow to the densely populated area of Kharkiv region. The enemy is looking for different methods how to strike. Uses a weapon that he has not used before or not used often to check our air defense system and detect holes. However, we see that a large number of defeat means is destroyed by our defense forces, ”the spokesman said.

He stressed that Ukraine needs even more air defense systems in order to continue to effectively protect our citizens.

As reported by the ArmyInform, the Anti -Time Defense of UkrainedestroyedThis night, 58 hostile "Shahmed" and 26 missiles of different types.
title: In the Air Force named the features of today's rocket attack of the Russian Federation
description: A spokesman for the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Elijah Yevlash said about it ...
author: Army Inform
